title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and soft, with one mentioning it hits right above the knees. Moreover, they consider it a great fall/winter piece that feels good against the skin. However, the material thickness receives mixed feedback, with some saying it's just right while others find it thin. Additionally, opinions about sizing are divided between those who say it's true to size and those who disagree. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: I am 5'5.5", 225lbs. This dress is as soft as pajamas, has pockets, and is cute. Not much shape to it, but shaping underwear helps hide the lumps. I sized up for extra comfort. Arrived quickly, just in time for a Christmas party. I live in south Texas, so this may be too warm to wear on days over 60 degrees, but with tights, it would be perfect for anywhere north. Read more
items.author: Momma J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable versatility
items.body: i am 55, sounds old when u r 25, but my fashion preferences have pretty much remained the same. 5’8, 135 lbs, I generally wear a 6-8,,or a Medium. I wanted an A line sweater dress, the search brought up this dress. Models wear it in cold weather (long sleeves) but bare legged. Sorry, I don’t get that. But with tights or leggings I feel it is quite appropriate for any age. My 24 yr old daughter even commented she would like one. It is knit, washes and dries well, i would not call it a sweater dress. Comfortable weight, not too thin for fall ,but not a sweater knit. Very comfy without being slouchy or oversized. I personally do not like close fitting tops with leggings. This is cut as a dress, not a tunic, which is what I was looking for. I did order it for my daughter who wears an XL, and it fit true to size. She thinks it’s too “poofy” on me, but I like it a bit roomier than she wears hers. I wore mine the terra cotta color with brown leggings and brown booties. She wore her green one with navy leggings and tennis shoes to teach 2nd grade. Dress it up or down, very versatile, and I caught it for around $16. I bought black as well. Well pleased with price, quality, and fit, and ageless Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Cute, and One of My Favorites!
items.body: I love this dress! It’s super cozy and comfortable to wear, and the fit is really flattering with the pleated front. The pockets are a great bonus too. The material is a little on the thin side, but it’s still one of my favorite fall/winter dresses. Perfect for layering and easy to dress up or down! Read more
items.author: Mary Oglevie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, pockets, good quality
items.body: Soft, just a little stretchy, nice contour. Fabric has a little warmth to it. I dodnt notice the slight sleeve pouf on top as a design element feom the pics . Gives a little extra mobility in the shoulders. Also HAS POCKETS. in love. Will be wearing all thru fall &winter - can wear alone, or with leggings and boots for warmth and with oe without a belt. Lots of options - super happy wih this purchase! Read more
items.author: A.E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend!
items.body: This dress is so comfortable and cute. I love the fabric. It washes nicely and fits exactly right! Read more
items.author: Marilyn Sjaardema

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, comfortable and stylish dress
items.body: I absolutely LOVE, LOVE this dress! I had a new pair of boots and was looking for a winter-ish dress to wear with them so looking for certain colors. I can't believe I found this dress which has the exact shade of my boots. The dress is stretchy and so comfortable and also has pockets. I love it so much I went and ordered another dress. Not the same exact style but something different from OFEEFAN assuming it'll be similar quality and fit. Read more
items.author: Hutch4kids

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Work-Friendly Dress with Pockets!
items.body: This is exactly the kind of dress I usually love — comfy, casual, and still professional enough for work (I’m a teacher). And pockets! Always a win. The fabric and fit were great, but I returned it because the color just wasn’t right for my skin tone. Still a cute fall dress and worth a try if you like easy, everyday style. Read more
items.author: Robin Ennis-Cantwell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall dress
items.body: I got so many compliments on this dress. My mother in law said I need it in every color. Nice material that is thick enough to keep you warm, but not hot or uncomfortable. Soft and the perfect length to wear with a cute bootie. Read more
items.author: Kelly Little

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-caramel, D-green Grid, A-black, A-khaki, A-green, Red Grid, D-beige Print, D-stripe B, D-blue Grid, A-dark Grey, D-chocolate Brown, A-blue, Brown Grid, D-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
